title: Unapproachable (feat. Joe DeRosa)
description: If you need Dan Soder to be there he will be fast, but can the Bonfire co-host just slow down. Cheating on your partner is bad enough, but Jay thinks its how you get caught that truly determines if you can be forgiven. Kanye West’s speech sparks a discussion about bi-polar disorder.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
